.entry-header
Meet the board & Staff
Office Staff
Kamla Long
Executive Director
Bio
Allow me to introduce myself as the Executive Director for the Avon Park Chamber of Commerce. Having worked in diverse organizations from real estate to event planning to post secondary administration, I bring a strong drive to lead a project and engage others in a collaborative vision. As a previous business owner, a certified leadership development coach, I am equipped and ready for the opportunities ahead. I need your help and ask for your partnership to bring revitalization to Avon Park and subsequently Highlands County.
Kamla Long can be reached at
(941)321-9222, kamla.long@apccfl.org
Board Members
Justin Williams
President
Vice President/Commercial Banker, Crews Bank & Trust
Nancy Dodd

.entry-header
Chamber Events
The APCC hosts regular events throughout the year. We welcome all members, non-members and citizens to attend our events. We are always looking for event volunteers, committee members and ideas to add to the community calendar. Below is more information on each event.
OUR MAIN EVENTS
Networking Luncheons
Our monthly luncheon is held from September through May each year on the fourth Thursday each month, Except for November and December.  Location and cost will be listed on the RSVP form. Each luncheon is sponsored by one of our Chamber Partners.  Our season kick-off luncheon and our annual Tallahassee Wrap-Up, where we are joined by our Senator and Representative for a recap of each year’s legislative session, are highly favored with a packed attendance. We are always seeking businesses to sponsor luncheons. This allows you to spotlight your business! These monthly networking events gives the opportunity to present your business, talk about upcoming events and engage new support for your business goals! Your logo and business name will be on all advertising for that month. For more information, or to reserve a month to sponsor a luncheon, contact the APCC office today by email at info@apccfl.org.
RSVP & PAY
Monthly Mixers
RSVP
APCC Christmas Parade on Main
The Christmas parade is held on the Monday following Thanksgiving.
RSVP & PAY
Christmas in the Park
The APCC Christmas in the Park (Donaldson Park) is always the first Monday in December. This event spotlights our local choir talents from the Avon Park Elementary, Avon Park Middle, and Avon Park High Schools. This event allows the community to share in the beautiful holiday music that these choirs and their instructors have worked so hard on preparing. We also invite any other local choirs that wish to participate in this evening to contact the APCC office by email at info@apccfl.org.
Vendors Pay Here
Florida Flywheelers Park
Flywheeler Park opens their season in November of every year. They have scheduled events from November to February each season. The APCC has been a long time partner of the Florida Flywheeler events by coordinating and providing volunteer tractor tram drivers for the park during the November, January & February event dates. We are always looking to expand our contact list for these drivers. Please contact the office today if you are interested in being a tractor tram drivers.
Dates:
November 6 – 9, 2024
January 15 – 18, 2025
February 19 – 22, 2025
Fusion Fest (Not being hosted in 2025)
Join us for all day event that starts in the morning and goes into the evening of celebrating cultures from around the world. Travel from continent to continent and try foods from different cultures, there will be a silent auction, cash bar and a night of dueling piano’s as Howl at the Moon rocks downtown Avon Park.
5K Run Registration Here
Vendors Signup Here
Fusion Feast RSVP Here
APCC Buy A Brick
Does legacy matter to you?! Leave yours in Avon Park! Buy a Brick for everyone in your family, your company name or logo or for a friend!
Pay For Brick Here
APCC Ribbon Cutting Request
Request Here
Christmas Parade Sponsorship
Request to be a Sponsor at Parade - $2,500.
Emcee and sound system, Free coffee, Photos with Grinch and Santa, Lighting of big tree. Christmas Trees for sale are sponsorship options.
Learn More
Monthly Luncheon Sponsorship
Request to sponsor luncheon. $275. Speaker and promo materials on tables.
Learn More
Monthly Networking Mixers Sponsorship
Request to host Monthly Mixer at your organization
Learn More
APCC Annual Banquet Sponsorship
Request to Sponsor banquet dinner at The Hotel Jacaranda.
Bronze - $1500
Silver - $2500
Gold - $3500
Learn More
.entry-content .clear
